questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage 230
connect the equipment where the AC Voltage 230 is provided
open the front panel, check the fuse for continuity and confirm whether the fuse is defective.
replace the fuse with a new one
check and confirm whether the output voltages are available at the power supply
repair / replace the power supply with a new one
replace the control board with a new
check and confirm whether able to set the Depth mode
open the front panel, check the continuity of micro switches and confirm whether the micro switches are defective
replace the micro switches with a new one
replace the control board
check whether the display is blank
repair / replace the display accordingly
check and confirm whether the LED Bulb does not glow when the equipment is ON.
open the panel of dome, check the continuity of lamp and confirm whether the lamp is defective.
replace the LED lamp with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
